name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Isaac RIVERA, Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Isaac RIVERA, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Based upon our disposition in Commonwealth v. Williams, 557 Pa. 285, 733 A.2d 593 (1999), we affirm the Order of the Lancaster County Court of Common Pleas dated January 22, 1999. Furthermore, we remand the matter to the Superior Court for disposition of any remaining issues.
Jurisdiction is relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph C. Madenspaeher, Dist. Atty., Susan E. Moyer, Asst. Dist. Atty., for Commonwealth.
Hobie Crystle, Lancaster, for Isaac Rivera.
casebody.head_matter:
735 A.2d 703
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Isaac RIVERA, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Aug. 3, 1999.
Decided Sept. 9, 1999.
Joseph C. Madenspaeher, Dist. Atty., Susan E. Moyer, Asst. Dist. Atty., for Commonwealth.
Hobie Crystle, Lancaster, for Isaac Rivera.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
